reqs:
For registration in ZOOL 500 Directed Studies, students must complete and submit a Directed Studies form to the Zoology Graduate Program. The ZOOL 500 Directed Studies registration form can be found at www.zoology.ubc.ca/graduate-studies/moreinfo .
